text: Huey, Dewey, and Louie are Disney characters. They are Donald Duck's nephews and triplets. The trio first appeared in a newspaper comic strip on October 17, 1937. Their first animated appearance was in the short film Donald's Nephews, released April 15, 1938. They starred in the 1987 television series DuckTales. In the DuckTales stories they appeared in adventures with their great-uncle, Scrooge McDuck. In the 1990s series Quack Pack the boys were shown as teenagers. ==Images== ==Other websites== * * * Category:Disney characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1938 Category:Fictional ducks
title: Huey, Dewey and Louie
